author: Veronika Kero
title: 14 unexpected ways to spruce up your WFH space
description: For those of us with the privilege to do so, working from home is no longer a fun perk offered by your company on the occasional Friday. The truth is that we don't know how long we'll be operating out of a home office, so it may be time to start thinking long…
content:
For those of us with the privilege to do so, working from home is no longer a fun perk offered by your company on the occasional Friday. 
The truth is that we don't know how long we'll be operating out of a home office, so it may be time to start thinking lo… [+5980 chars]
